Description: Deteriorates armor and weapons.
Disadvantage on next roll or check.
Puts out lights in an area.
Instills fear, targets must make will save or move away from caster.
Drain 1D20 of Mana from target and regain 1/2 for yourself.
Kills any other spells.
Gives the target a random painful event.
Shoots 6 spikes of Stygian metal from your hand.
Transforms what is being targeted into a more bestial or monstrous version, turning animals into dire beasts, and beastman into ferals, all under the casters control.
This spell ensnares the mind of whoever it's cast upon, corrupting them to fulfill whatever desire the cast has for them to do.
Reverse the attack that comes for you, more effective on spells but can work on physical hits. Forces the attacker to take the damage from their own attack.
This spell cleaves through meat and flesh with ease, bypassing armor and shields. Splits and rends the organic, but does nothing to the non-organic.
Encases whatever weapon is in hand with an obsidian like material that empowers the weapon, quadrupling it's damage.

Encases the Caster's body in a weave of the black, making their bodies an armored vessel, gain +1000 DR, the only way to break it is with blunt trauma, 1D6 times, or being hit with a similar strength white magic spell.

A projectile spell that takes 1D4 turns to charge before firing, but upon release and contact with a target detonates a 25ft cone that traps anyone in the radius within a sheet of the black. They take 5D10 damage a turn, until freed with a DC check of 19, or being freed by similar level white magic.

Upon being cast the monolith begins a countdown. Upon reaching 0 it detonates, obliterating all life within it's reach, turning it all to nothing but fragile obsidian like glass. Also causes the caster to lose consciousness.
See alignment of things and creatures.
Create an orb of light that follows you.
Purifies items or people. Can deal 1D10 radiant damage to undead or abominations.
Cancel magic on successful roll, is shaped like a shield.
Gifts someone a normally personal effect of a spell, or it provides a count of advantage on your next check if used without another spell.
Create a holy damage projectile.
Coats weapon in radiant magic.
Detect life, You can see life signs through walls.
Grants an ally double advantage on a skill check.
Can repair items, even magical ones using holy light and white magic. If it's missing large chunks it gets replaced by a pure alabaster stone.
Creates a mantle of light onto yourself, providing +8DR, +2AC, and giving your weapons the ability to fire holy bolts of light.
Increases caster's strength using their casting modifier for 10 minutes.
Summons a semblance of the blade Heaven's Gate in your hand.
A massive holy blast centered on yourself. Can free people from Book of the Black spells
Summons a Valkyrie to assist you.

Creates slabs or blocks of pure crystallized holy magic that can be used in vast multitudes of ways, from making pathways to making tools, it can perform whatever is needed of it, including turning into a shield, but not a weapon.
Summons lesser incarnate elemental cheap and simple but can summon more than one at a time. 0.5 summon slot cost. Dex type
Summons a serpentine/draconic elemental, large and menacing heavy hitter. 4 summon slots. Str type
Summons golem style elemental. These are your tanks. 3 summon slots. Con type
Summons a spell casting turret. 1 summon slot. Int type
Summons a higher elemental versatile and useful a good mix of health, defense and offense. 2 summon slots. Wis type
Cantrip: Summons a sprite of random elemental flavor 4 at a time
Summons an elemental humanoid homunculus, a helping hand of many ways, partially to fully sapient. 1 summon slot. Cha type
Raises an amount of skeletons or one large skeleton, bones must be provided
Reduces the durability of affected item
Allows user to talk to dead
Cause the target to have their flesh painfully start to decay
Necrotic ray that rots the life out of anything hit by it.
Become incorporeal for a time, and return to a corporeal form with a secondary casting of the spell for less mana. 4 mana to cast and 2 to return
Drains life from opponent and gives half to the caster
Force any nearby undead to pass back into death.

Spreads blighted ground in the area, causing undead and spells to be more powerful, also saps the life out of any weak creatures and has a small chance to cause death. Anything that dies in the blight is reanimated into an undead controlled by the caster for 1d6 rounds.

Projects a ray that inflicts necrotic energy, and is incredibly deadly to swarms of anything living, also it has the added benefit of causing decay on living matter, allowing it's use to Rot through doors or anything wooden.

Launches a ghastly ball at your enemies it deals necrotic damage, if the target ends up dying to this attack the Mage gains it's soul, which can be expended in casting Wraith to make a more powerful incorporeal undead.
Creates a ghostly servant, allowing the animation of Wraiths ghosts and similar undead.
Mass reanimation spell, which can raise 20 corpses at once.
A ghostly bolt that can hit multiple targets in a line, passing through each target.
Summon a lich like apparition, wielding a pair of scythes

Makes a massive area whither instantly, and blight to spread all over the area, sapping the life out of everything around. Causing necrotic damage to slowly build up on all enemies within the area, but heals undead every turn.
Infects target with a disease, roll a D20 to determine the disease.
Slows the target down. It is as though time has slowed for them.
Deal poison damage on a touch, that deals 1D6 damage every turn until cured.
Summons either three small rats, or one large rat
Spit a ray of caustic acid at opponent. Deals lingering 1D10 Acid Damage.
2 square wall of sticky goo.
Summon a medium green slime.
A blast of acid for 1D12 per square
Forces someone to develop lycanthropy and transform, becoming enraged and attacking all people in the vicinity. Inflicts True lycanthropy when paired with disease.
Creates a swarm of creatures that follow the caster's commands, Consult Dm's swarm table for what is summon.
Forces someone to develop Vampirism and are inflicted with it temporarily, unless it's coupled with Disease.
Target is forced to have disadvantage on any strength related checks for 1D8 turns.
Causes target to be wracked with temporary damage, which can render them immobile and helpless, if used on a target with low enough HP.
Causes the target to petrify, encasing them in stone. Requires target failed a reflex, fortitude, and will save, if they succeed at least 1, it's not permanent.
Creates a large area of green clouds that inflict damage over time, debuffs and strengthens disease magic.
Creates a full squad of Fetid Gnolls, who obey the caster without question, or if used before Fetid Gnolls they pledge allegiance to the caster.
Creates a stone pillar
Summon a rock projectile
Creates a rock wall
Encases fist in rock
Creates a pool of quicksand. If cast on rock turns rock to gravel. When cast on gravel it turns it into sand, which with one more cast can finally turn it into sand.
Allows user to repair small items made of earthen material (rock & metal)
Softens earth, or can be used as a ray of blinding sand that pelts its target. Can be cast with Rock Wall to create larger and more elaborate defensive structures.
Creates a whip of sand

Creates a rift in the earth, a chasm that allows safe passage down, to an underground cave, or subterranean area with ease, also can be used inside dungeons to go to the next floor if the way down is blocked.
Fires a Shard of crystallized earth that soars through the air at a target, upon impact it shatters, showering the target with razor sharp crystal shards.
Launches a torrent of rocks and gravel from the ground to land onto a specific target and area
Creates a singular spike of rock to burst out of the ground and stab the target.
Creates a moderately sized boulder and launches it with lethal force.

Causes a massive floating crystal to grow in the room, which emanates empowering magic, which regeneratess mana. This crystal also periodically fires small shards of crystal at hostiles. Once a turn unleashes 1D12 flakes that fly at enemies.
Causes a severe localized earthquake, deals 10 times the damage to structures.
Creates a soldier made of stone and clay, each one costs 6 mana. You can summon a maximum of 20 at a time. This spell CAN be learned out of book sequence.
Coats weapon in ice for 1D6 extra damage.
Coats weapon in fire for 1D6 extra damage.
Stick your weapon in the ground to coat it in stone to increment the weapon's damage die.
Create a beam of damage that extends your weapon's range

Coats the weapon in a flow of Acid which can rapidly eat throw most materials with ease. This acid also acts as a slimy fluid which enhances the length of the given weapon, increasing it's base damage dice by 1 dice level.
Creates a coating upon the weapon which allows the weapon to pierce even the fiercest of armors. Grand level piercing. Also delivers a mild poison. 1D4 poison.

Coats the weapon in thorny vines that when they strike a target leave the weapon and embed in the target, dealing a lingering damage when they preform complicated actions, which includes attacking, running, and dodging. These vines can have Growth magic focused onto them.
Coats the weapon with a layer of contagious rust, that upon hitting other metal causes them to rapidly corrode, this effect works on all metal objects, and once it starts only a Wish may stop it.

Every swing of your weapon now carries a tremendous amount of raw force behind it, and upon contact with an enemy or most object inflicts a burst of magic that upon a failed save (save is 10+casting stat+level of spell) can shatter any non magical objects or send an opponent flying 1D12 squares.

Coats the weapon in a vacuum of incredible pressure, that saws at the air itself as it swings. This coating delivers multiple dice of damage on hit and utterly eviscerates living foes. Also upon expending the spell the caster can direct a blast of 4D10 squares of water at an area.

A Stygian coating engulfs your weapon, inflicting deadly necrotic power with every strike, if it's stabbed into a dead enemy or kills and enemy that corpse rises as an undead under the casters control. Also if expended at a target it will deal a blast of 8D6 necrotic power that if it manages to kill a target they rise as a greater under the casters control.

Coats the weapon in a tornado allowing you to swing it with wild abandon. Grants 2 additional melee attack with this weapon, also allows the caster to fling low weight objects at enemies. You can also expend the spell to make it release a massive burst of air, which can prevent fall damage.
Add caster's int modifier to either hit or damage.
Add +2 to AC and a +3 damage resist
Mends natural things, not wood.
Longer spells or apply to weapons or armor to briefly enchant with a spell.
Summons an animated sword
Summons a weapon of your choosing, that has previously bound to you using this spell.
Can permanently enchant a weapon with a magical effect.
Increases die level for damage, Increases DR or Increases durability.
Boils liquids, not in a living entity.
Touch and set on fire (deals 1D6 each round) for 1D6 rounds
Create a ray of fire from your hand or implment that burns the target.
Ignites flammable object, that is readily burnable, and is not attached to a person's body. If it is held in hand it can ignite those items.
A shielding spell that wraps you in false flames that absorbs fire, whether magical or not. Resist 10 fire damage.
Cast a firebal, that sets the target on fire.
Heats a small area temporarily
Blast of steam, either out of implement or mouth
Creates a massive blast wave of immolating fire that clings to everything in it's massive AoE.
Launches a explosive fireball at target.
A controllable mobile sphere that ignites and burns the area around it. Can move 30ft a turn.
Creates a pillar of fire that also deals damage in a blast radius around it.
Sends out a cone of dragons breathe, which pushes targets back, taking damage for every square their moved in the cone.
Causes the target to erupt in an explosion. Especially effective on target's encased in the Black.
Causes a massive area to be engulfed in flames, spreading from the caster, increasing fire magic damage and causing damage over time.
Summons a large Tine Scorpion, a massive molten scorpion from the guts of a volcano, capable of being a mount or even a siege weapon with its lava spewing tail.
Balance and stabilize yourself or your target.
Blasts everything in a close area near the caster 1D6 squares.
Stops your target, heavier items can be held for much less time
Pulls target or object towards you.
Add your spell modifier to your jump in squares.
Lifts objects and creatures, the more books of force you have determines how heavy they can be and how far.
Notes: Improves with books, weight increases be 150 pounds per book, starts at 100lb.

Description: Launches a barrage of magical projectiles made from pure force, that are aimed at a singular target.
Forces an object away from you centered on your hand. Can launch thrown weapons twice the regular distance, or can make then deal twice the damage at closer ranges.
Creates a barrier around yourself, has 6D10 health.
Allows you to block an enemy melee attack using a spell, like a shield without being encumbered by one.
Encases a target in a nearly unbreakable prison of force magic.
Creates a sphere of pure force that can be used for all manner of utility or combat roles.
Inflicts a horrible crushing attack on a target, if the target is wearing armor, damage doubles.
Forces all targets in the room to crumple to the floor from overwhelming pressure, rending them unable to move or take any actions. Nonlethal.
Coats the caster's body in a suit of raw force magic, who will now take no damage from non magical attacks.
Creates a wall in front of the caster made of force magic.
Grows plants from nothing in a 3X3, it costs less when plants are present, and vice versa.
Touch poison that lasts until the creature makes con save
Ensnares living creatures
Creates a whip from plants with 30 ft of reach
Grows a fruit that heals 1D10 upon consumption, must be cast on plants.
Cast on a corpse this will animate the corpse with plants temporarily bringing it back to life. When used on a target that died after the spell 'Seed' was used, it lowers the cost to cast.
Launches seeds that leach the life from your enemies on hit.
Creates a thorn grove that inflicts damage per square
Sends forth a rapid fire wave of leafs that can eviscerate opponents from afar.

Creates a massive blast wave of razor sharp petals that flood from the caster and deals poison damage to all enemies, also if they fail the check to take half damage  they also are rendered immobile for 4 turns.
Roots the target/caster in place, and gives them 1D10, mana and HP regeneration, but lose the ability to move.
Lays a bunch of sharp stems in the ground which burst forth when stepped on, impaling the afflicted enemy and stopping them in their tracks.
Summons a Royal Dryad.
Summons a Elder Treeant
After two turns unleashes a devastation beam of light, only works during daylight.
Allows caster to communicate with Tree's, plants, and all manner of Flora.
AOE healing of 2D4 per round
Cures poison, acid and disease
Heals wounds to an extent. Can't heal large wounds.
Gives a bonus AC of +2 to the target
Allows the caster to gives spells to others
Passive saving throw advantage for 1D6 rounds
Allows for ranged healing.
Provides an attack buff of an extra modifier's worth to damage rolls for 1D6 rounds.
Grants target 40 temp HP, and allows them to recover a quarter of the spent mana for the duration of that temp HP.
Allows the dispelling of greater afflictions, like petrification, or ritual curses.
Large burst of healing onto a target, can heal large wounds.
Emits a large field which makes undead flee.
Grants 120 temp Hp, +2 Bonus to AC. Makes all attacks cost half AP. Reduces movement to 10ft a turn.
Instant revival spell and provides 2D20 healing, or refills 2 chance counts
Summons an aspect of the Queen of the Fairy's who provides free healing spells for all within a massive area.
Dm discretion advised. Only Omuns can resist a Wish spell.
Fires beams of damaging light scales with mind magic book levels, amplifying dice per book learned
Allows the user to check for basic information of an item, scales with how high in mind magic they are.
Read target's mind scales with mind magic book levels.
Allows caster to use objects as projectiles, or move them at will.
Charms the target for the duration.
Affected person is unreasonable for duration.
Causes blood thirst, forcing the target to attack anyone in the vicinity.
Forces target to sleep on a failed will save.
Allows caster to create illusions of anything, cannot actually harm people.
Turns the caster and gear invisible, but does nothing to help the sound, also notable is some magic weapons or items will interfere with the invisibility.
Paralyzes a target for a long length of time, this can work on all living beings, even warforged.
Links a pair of minds for easy communication.
Seizes control over a target's mind, making them do as the caster wishes.
Once cast this spell is always in affect, allows caster to cast spells mentally. No longer needing to speak the words.
Causes the target to experience a physical ailment of awful intensity, deals damage every round.
Summons a Eye'd Horror to do it's master's bidding.
Allows underwater breathing.
Create a geyser of water.
Causes a blast of ink to shoot from the caster's hand causing temporary blindness to those hit by the spell
Turns caster or target into a merfolk.
Gives caster a large crab claw in place of their hand.
Create a beam of water + 20 ft push back.
Envelops caster in a shell until dispelled or shattered.
Covers in urchin armor spikes.
Gives caster 4 tentacles in place of one of their arms, can crush opponents or restrict them.
Turns the caster into water for a limited time, making them invulnerable, but not allowed to attack.
Magically grow a set of shark jaws on the caster.
Sting ray tail, can attack an extra time with it, it can deliver a dangerous lingering stunning poison.
Summons a Kraken to the battlefield.
Creates a sawfish blade growing out of the caster's arm, in place of their hand. This saw ignores AC, leaves opponent crippled, and can chew through most materials.
Grow a thresher shark tail, which can attack and cause break, also moves target 1D4 squares.
Creates an area of sheer darkness, this area makes all enemies inside it endure disadvantage on all checks made within it's reach.
Calms storms or weather.
Creates fog in your area that helps cloak allies from enemy attacks.
Creates a ray of hail stemming from your hand. Pelt enemies with the hail for damage.
Creates a rainstorm.
Direct this blast of lightning to a spot of your choosing for an AOE adjacent to the center of the blast.
Modifier of rain that makes the rain oil. Can also be a ray of oil that deals no damage.
Modifier of rain that slows.
Modifier of fog for poison damage.
Plasters a target with smoldering burning ash, if the target gets hit three times or more, it combusts explosively. The only way to remove the stacks is complete submersion in water.
Launches a burning projectile that upon impacting explodes into a 15 ft cone.
Fills the area  with a massive cloud of mist that reduces visibility to only 10ft around a person.
Modifier of rain, which creates highly volatile explosive liquid.
Creates a storm of fire and brimstone from the heavens, WILL cause mass collateral damage. Explosive chunks of burning hail fall from the sky.
Conjures a massive sky whale that blots out the sun, and it unleashes a torrent of broken off sky barnacles, and chitinous spikes.
Unleashes a cloud of noxious toxic fumes, that seeks out ANY living targets near the spell and moves to them.

Creates a large storm that can be used with any other sky spell to create a variety of storms. When used alone it creates a sizeable and long lived storm. Duration adjusts for how much mana is being pumped into the spell.
Your hand gets wrapped in lightning and electricity the next person you grab will be heavily shocked.
Sends out a shockwave that deals damage to each square it hits.
Unleash a torrent of electricity from your hands or implement.
Create a coating on your armor that shocks your opponent on a successful melee attack against you.
5*5 centered around you creating a shockwave that stuns as well as damages.
Direct electricity, or electrical currents, allowing you to divert sparks spells and channeling sparks magic to a particular place, or direct it in a particular way.
A singular bolt of electricity that can reach out and strike someone from afar.
Deafening blast in a 3*3 area. Which leaves enemies dazed and deafened.
Allows the Caster to add a charged version to any other spell, cast with this as a modifier, greatly enhances all aspects of other spell
Creates a pillar of lighting that moves around the battlefield wildly, seeking the nearest enemy target.
Allows the Caster to move the Sparks spells to curve around obstacles or redirect them towards different targets. Can also be used on enemy Sparks magic.
Creates a immense blast-wave of thunder and lightning centered on the caster. It can damage terrain and structures SIGNIFICANTLY.

Creates a spontaneous lightning storm that the caster is locked into controlling for the next 6 turns. All Sparks spells cast during the duration will now originate from the clouds, and deal triple damage.
Chain lighting that upon hitting an enemy will leap at least 15ft to hit the next enemy, every enemy hit increases the total damage of the spell.
The caster fires a powerful beam of lightning for long range damage that can hit multiple targets in a line.
Summons a Thundering Clockwork Horror, equipped with a array of lightning based attacks
Summon a crab of varying size
Summon a Bear
Summon a snake + stealth
Summon 1 big wolf or 4 small wolves.
Summon a massive elephant, ready to trample, gore or crush any who oppose the summoner.
Summon a Gale Hawk, which can easily glide with the caster held  at it's talons. and has a series of wind based attacks.
Summons a large lion
Conjure an Illusory Leopard, a strange beast that can disappear at will and can leap out of shadows to attack it's foes.
Allows the summoner to combine their summons to create combination creatures.
Summon a massive Armored Rhino, an immense beast coated with thick plating of keratin capable of plowing through stone walls with ease.

When nearby coastline it summons a large shark of some variety, when not near coastline a shark seemingly falls from the sky, but it's a sky shark, flying predators that once were the scourge of the sky-lands.
Summon a horde of Drill Horn centipede's that can preform many tasks, including digging and drilling large holes, or burrowing a tunnel through rock.

Summons a massive Wind Stone Dragonfly, that can be used as a large scale transport, capable of carrying fully loaded wagons. The Dragonfly can also use it's eyes as spotlights to search area's and locate things in turbulent condiditons.
Summon an Anubi magitech construct, one that was built to be a machine version of their race, a strong dedicated melee fighter.
Summon a armored griffin to whisk the caster to safety and provide a insanely fast mount.
Summon one of the oldest Rocs to aid in your battle, the legendary Muninn
Summon a Doppelganger to aid you in combat, can copy all the spells and ability of the caster.
Conjure a forgotten beast with a large mass covered in eyes, and a body of chitin encrusted tentacles.
Catch a projectile
Catch things on a plane
Push back 1D4 spaces
Create a wind blade that slashes enemy
Glides things down to ground or surface
Wind ball that pushes back 1D8 squares
Plus 10 movement for 1D6+casting stat rounds
Shield of wind
This spell while dealing low damage per square excels in making many opponents hurt each other as they are pulled into the swirling cyclone causing more damage the more enemies are pulled inside.
Lifts one target and deals massive wind damage to them.
Launches a condensed ball of wind that explodes on impact and sends anyone in the target area reeling. Enemies move 1-2 squares from the blast.
Unleashes a massive blast of wind centered on the caster, all targets nearby are forced prone or are flung 1d12 squares.
Grants the caster the ability of flight. Fly speed 45. This has to be up-kept every round.
Creates a swirling tornado that the Caster can move around the battlefield causing massive destructive where ever it goes, it moves 15ft a turn.

Causes the entire area to be filled with harsh winds, that reduce movement speed to 10 ft a turn for all but the caster.  Every turn targets in the zone will take 1d4 damage and be moved 1d4 in a random direction.
Summons a massive Zephyr beast.
Freezes whatever is touched. Can cause frostbite to creatures if used enough.
Creates a ray of icy magic.
Creates snowballs that shoot from your hands/implement.
Covers the battlefield in a foot of snow. Gain a +3 for Winter spells. Enemies slowed and Allies unaffected.
Creates 1D4 Ice spears that can be fired.
Cools an area down
Creates an ice wall that can be in an occupied square.
Creates 4 icicles that can be fired from your hand.
Launches a massive snowflake buzzsaw of ice that can easily cut down tree's, people, and most wooden objects.
Launches an explosive shard of ice that detonates on contact and flash freezes everything around it.
Creates a thick snowy path under the caster's feet, letting them create pathways to areas normally unreachable. Enemies trying to ascend it have to make a save or fall down it.
An area marked by the caster begins being assaulted by shards of ice that cascade from above, after duration is over the shards embedded in the ground make it difficult terrain.
Creates a swirling blizzard, which begins dealing constant freezing damage to all enemies in the area.
Creates a swarm of massive icy wagon sized chunks of ice that get launched at a target.
Conjurers a wendigo that is loyal to the caster.
Blasts a beam of freezing energy, freezing everything in it's path. A critical fail freezes target's into ice sculptures.
